Daily

Proud

Published by Ted on 26 Feb 2020. Contains tags related to: courage  people 

Yesterday my girlfriend was accepted to grad school. It was a day filled with joy, hugs, and tears. It is not an exaggeration to say that it is an opportunity of a lifetime for her.

As the excitement wears off I find myself feeling very proud of her, but not in the way I would have thought. I am not proud of her for getting in, but I am proud of the hope she permitted herself to have. I am not proud of her good test scores, but I am proud of that she studied and showed up for the test.
